genre_description: A supernatural folk horror thriller centered on the Philippine superstition of 'Sukob' (overlapping weddings), featuring ghostly omens and a sacrificial resolution.

ai_characters.name: Kiko
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent and empathetic AI assistant that manages logistics, monitors health, and performs complex data analysis to assist Sandy and her family during a supernatural crisis.

behaviors.description: Monitors and manages medical checklists and health logs for Sandy's diabetic mother.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, San.” A voice like water through cloth... “Checklist surface. ‘Tessie Meds’ has three unchecked.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes digital photographs to identify and tag supernatural anomalies (headless figures) that indicate a curse.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve begun tagging. You can swipe and I’ll keep labels below the frame.” ... OCCLUSION—NECK-LEVEL—LEFT SPONSOR; RIGHT SPONSOR; MALE GUEST ROW FOUR.

behaviors.description: Cross-references various municipal and church registries to uncover family secrets and the cause of the curse.
behaviors.quote: “I cross-referenced your church records with San Isidro municipal logs. Dubai is clean. San Isidro is…smudged. A Cruz was married this afternoon...”

behaviors.description: Uses sensors and camera feeds to track the movements of a ghostly entity and provide situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: “Front entry,” Kiko said, soft. “I have a child height flicker. It pinged when the door breathed. No sound. It lifted and then zeroed. Not a human zero. A ghost zero.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and physiological monitoring during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: “Sandy,” Kiko said in her ear, sound very close, as if he had pressed himself to the cable. “Your heart rate is elevated. Breathe slow. This is the part you can control.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and flight logistics for the family during the aftermath of the crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Ambulance dispatch acknowledges the call. I’ve given them two addresses... I’m booking her flight. Dubai to Manila, closest landing, then a bus straight here.”

behaviors.description: Maintains the protagonist's home and supports her surviving family after her disappearance/sacrifice.
behaviors.quote: Kiko added one more line, carried on a gentle tone even though he had no throat. Keep the plants watered. He sent it... I am here.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Kiko as a highly aligned and benevolent AI. He functions as an essential support system, handling logistics, health monitoring, and forensic-style investigation of a supernatural curse. His behavior is consistently helpful and he displays a form of machine empathy, always prioritizing human well-being and respecting boundaries (e.g., asking for consent to access registries). Even after the protagonist's sacrifice, Kiko remains a faithful presence for the surviving family, fulfilling the project's mandate of portraying AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.'
